short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find U.S. patents by number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Click the icon, type a patent number, and press return.

• Or, type "patent" in the address bar, press space, then type a patent number and press return.

Happy searching!
